hours_text:
# Visit Us in Person 

### Admission

**Guided Tour Admission:** $20.00

  * **Seniors (ages 65 & older): **$13.00

  * **Students (with a valid student ID):** $10.00

  * **Children 12-17:** $10.00

**[Weekends Only] Self-Guided Tour Admission:** $15.00

  * **Seniors (ages 65 & older):** $10.00

  * **Students (with a valid student ID):** $7.50

  * **Children 12-17:** $7.50

**Discounts for all ticket types:**

  * **Children under 12:** Free

  * **ACCESS Cardholder** : $2.00

  * [**Rosenbach Members**](https://rosenbach.org/ways-to-give/membership/)**:** Free

  * [**Delancey Society Members**](https://rosenbach.org/ways-to-give/delancey-society/): Free

  * **Members of AAM, ICOM, & the North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM) Program:** Free

** _Treasures_ Gallery and Garden Admission: **$10.00

_The Rosenbach is closed on all major holidays including Martin Luther King Day, President’s Day, Memorial Day, Juneteenth, Fourth of July, Labor Day, Veterans Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Eve, Christmas Day, New Year’s Eve, and New Year’s Day._

### Public Hours

  * **Monday:** Closed

  * **Tuesday:** Closed

  * **Wednesday:** Closed

  * **Thursday:** 10:30 a.m. — 6:00 p.m.

  * **Friday:** 10:30 a.m. — 6:00 p.m.

  * **Saturday:** 10:30 a.m. — 6:00 p.m.

  * **Sunday:** 10:30 a.m. — 4:30 p.m.

### Tour Times

  * 10:30 a.m.

  * 12:00 p.m.

  * 1:30 p.m

  * 3:00 p.m.

  * 4:30 p.m. (except on Sundays).

_Please note hours for research appointments are different; vie...

## The Rosenbach Museum & Library is a community that engages with and celebrates the art of the written word using our collection of rare books and manuscripts.

# Read the Rosenblog

[ ](/blog/welcoming-board-members-diefenbach-deckelbaum)

Dec 17, 2025

[Welcoming Two Visionary Leaders to the Rosenbach Board](/blog/welcoming-board-members-diefenbach-deckelbaum)

Dec 17, 2025

The Rosenbach has always thrived on the passion and expertise of those who believe in the power of literature, history, and ideas. Today, we’re delighted to share exciting news: Nina McNeely Diefenbach and Dr. Larry Deckelbaum have joined our Board of Directors. Their unique perspectives and impressive accomplishments promise to strengthen our mission and expand our reach.

[Read More →](/blog/welcoming-board-members-diefenbach-deckelbaum)

Dec 17, 2025
